rules_text:
Trample
[i]Unnerve [/i]– Whenever one or more cards you own are put into exile from anywhere for the first time each turn, exile the top card of your library and Firemane Feline gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is that card’s mana value.
Whenever Firemane Feline attacks, until end of turn, you may play cards exiled with it.
